mapper.select: select bo.no as no ,bo.title as title ,bo.content as content ,bo.hit as hit ,bo.reg_date as regDate ,us.name as name ,us.no as userNo FROM board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no ORDER BY bo.no asc

SELECT ort.rn ,ort.no ,ort.title ,ort.content ,ort.hit ,ort.regDate ,ort.name ,ort.userNo FROM (SELECT rownum rn ,ot.no ,ot.title ,ot.content ,ot.hit ,ot.regDate ,ot.name ,ot.userNo FROM (select b.no ,b.title ,b.content ,b.hit ,to_char(b.reg_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi') regDate ,u.name ,b.user_no userNo from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no ORDER BY u.no asc) ot ) ort where ort.rn >= #{stratRNum} and ort.rn <= #{endRNum}

select bo.no as no ,bo.title as title ,bo.content as content ,bo.hit as hit ,bo.reg_date as regDate ,us.name as name ,us.no as userNo FROM board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no and bo.no = #{int}

select bo.no as no ,bo.title as title ,bo.content as content ,bo.hit as hit ,bo.reg_date as regDate ,us.name as name ,us.no as userNo FROM board bo, users us where bo.user_no = us.no and title like '%'||#{title}||'%' ORDER BY bo.no desc
